meanings: get better every day[day by day]
실용회화-사내에서 I like to look different.

vlive.korean: 다르게? In a different way? 듣기 View video OSEN : '스타로드' CIX #EP 08
어제와는 다르게 의상이 굉장히 화이트하고요! The outfits are very white, unlike yesterday! 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: The outfits are very white, unlike yesterday!

vlive.korean: 얼굴의 왼쪽, 오른쪽이 어떻게 그렇게 다르게 나오지? How is it that the right side and left side of my face came out looking so different? 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : [Special] MOONBYUL's Weird Day Vlog #1
vlive.english: How is it that the right side and left side of my face came out looking so different?

vlive.korean: 그날과 다르게 많이 더웠나? "Was it hot"? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] 러브야🐯
때때로 다르게 불린다고? It gets called differently at times? 듣기 View video VICTON : 깜짝부이앱
vlive.english: It gets called differently at times?

examples.korean: I see things differently now. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 이제 상황을 다르게 본다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I see things differently now. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Her leg was bent at an unnatural angle. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀의 다리는 (일반 다리와 다르게) 휘어져 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her leg was bent at an unnatural angle. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She affected a calmness she did not feel. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 속마음과 다르게 태연을 가장했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She affected a calmness she did not feel. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She kissed him with unusual fervour. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 평소와 다르게 열정적으로 그에게 키스를 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She kissed him with unusual fervour. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The disagreement arose over a different use of terminology. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 용어를 다르게 사용할 것을 두고 불화가 일어났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The disagreement arose over a different use of terminology. Add to Wordbook
